sentence.Network_en: The discoverer of the Pacific walked " valorous and serene " into the public square and was beheaded.
sentence.Network_cn: 这位太平洋的发现者 “ 英勇无畏,泰然自若地 ” 步入公共广场,被斩首处决.

sentence.Network_en: Throughout the coming years, he would commit great and valorous deeds.
sentence.Network_cn: 纵观今后几年内, 他将致力于伟大和valorous事迹.
